Package cinema

Interface DisplayUserPage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MainDisplayPage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerApp, StaffApp
    interface DisplayUserPage
extends MainDisplayPage
    Boundary class between MainDisplayPage and CustomerApp. Provides printing and display of options in movie-goer module.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Myat Hmu Khin
    See Also:
    CustomerApp, MainDisplayPage

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int custLogin()
      Gets unique customer ID if it already exists in database via asking for user email using input.
      static void displayAddReview​(int custID)
      Displays process for adding a new review to a movie by a customer.
      static void displayAllMovie()
      Displays all movies.
      static void displayBookingHistory​(int ID)
      Displays past booking history of customer.
      static int displayBuyTicket​(int custID)
      Display for buying of ticket(s) by a customer.
      static void displaySearchMovie()
      Displays movie details of target movie selected by customer via input, as well as list of showtimes available for that movie.
      static void displayTopMovies​(int selection)
      Displays top 5 movies based on either ratings or sales.
      static void displayUserPage()
      Displays the initial menu page shown to user after login.
      static java.lang.String getPaymentMode​(int payment)
      Checks that payment mode is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • displayUserPage

        static void displayUserPage()
        Displays the initial menu page shown to user after login. Calls the appropriate methods for each menu option.

      • custLogin

        static int custLogin()
        Gets unique customer ID if it already exists in database via asking for user email using input. If no record exists in database, creates a new Customer object and adds it to database.
        Returns:
        Unique customer ID
        See Also:
        Customer

      • displayAllMovie

        static void displayAllMovie()
        Displays all movies.

      • displayTopMovies

        static void displayTopMovies​(int selection)
        Displays top 5 movies based on either ratings or sales.
        Parameters:
        selection - Choice between top 5 ratings or sales.
        1 for ratings, 2 for sales.

      • displaySearchMovie

        static void displaySearchMovie()
        Displays movie details of target movie selected by customer via input, as well as list of showtimes available for that movie.
        See Also:
        Movie

      • displayBookingHistory

        static void displayBookingHistory​(int ID)
        Displays past booking history of customer.
        Parameters:
        ID - Unique customer ID

      • displayAddReview

        static void displayAddReview​(int custID)
        Displays process for adding a new review to a movie by a customer. Includes error-checking.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID

      • getPaymentMode

        static java.lang.String getPaymentMode​(int payment)
        Checks that payment mode is valid.
        Parameters:
        payment - User-inputted payment mode
        Returns:
        Valid payment mode

      • displayBuyTicket

        static int displayBuyTicket​(int custID)
        Display for buying of ticket(s) by a customer. Includes error-checking.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID
        Returns:
        1 if ticket-buying is successful, -1 if not.
